Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.3-9, affected by CVE-2024-28180
